message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do a bit better than that. How about we meet in the middle at $8250?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from your previous offer. How about we try $7750?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I can do a bit better than my previous offer. How about we meet at $8080?
I'm getting close, but I still need to stay within my budget. How about we try $7600?
